title: Homepage Contact CTA Section
description:
Implement Lead Capture Contact Section at Page Bottom

Create a high-converting contact section positioned at the bottom of the page to capture leads from users before they exit. This section should target west Houston businesses with persuasive copy and a clear call-to-action.

Requirements:
- Position the section at the bottom of the page, above the footer
- Design a compelling headline that creates urgency or highlights value proposition
- Include supporting text that specifically mentions serving west Houston businesses and addresses their pain points or needs
- Add a prominent CTA button that links to the contact page
- Ensure the section stands out visually from surrounding content (consider contrasting background color or border)
- Make the CTA button action-oriented with specific copy (e.g., "Get Your Free Quote", "Schedule a Consultation" rather than generic "Contact Us")
- Ensure the section is fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
- Optimize for accessibility (proper heading hierarchy, ARIA labels, color contrast)
- Consider adding trust signals (testimonial count, years in business, service area badge) to increase conversions
- Track CTA button clicks for conversion analysis

Design Considerations:
- Use visual hierarchy to guide eyes from headline → supporting text → CTA
- Ensure sufficient padding/whitespace around the section
- CTA button should be large enough for easy clicking on mobile devices
- Consider subtle animation or styling to draw attention without being intrusive
